_id.description: A unique name amongst all the documents - usually the lowercaseCamelCase, space-removed version of the name will do. E.g. express

name.description: The human-readable name of the tool

description.description: A short description of the tool, aim to keep it within 20 words or 120 characters

summary.description: A longer description of the tool

language.description: Which language is this tool primarily being written in? Must be a valid id value from the Languages collection

environments.description: Which environment is this tool used in?

features.description: An array listing out features of the tool

scenario.description: An array listing out the use cases or scenarios where a person would use this tool

website.description: The URL to the official site, without the protocol

demo.description: URL to a demo, if any

similar.description: Each object shall represent a similar tool

usedby.description: An array of the organization ids
